DEFINITION: “Pompaganda” To spread only positive messages about Bitcoin. As done well by @APompliano. Example: Bitcoin hashing power down 30% and then back up. This is a glitch. Mining is decentralized! That is Pompaganda! Thanks @RichardHeartWin

DEFINITION: To “Pomp” something... (Named after its founder @APompliano ) To link something unrelated to Bitcoin in a positive way. Example: WeWork CEO forced to step down, Bitcoin has no CEO! Buy Bitcoin! I just “Pomped it”

It’s amazing how @APompliano has an amazing way of linking anything to Bitcoin and why Bitcoin will go up. So let’s start a little game called “Pomp it” . Name the topic and link it to why Bitcoin will go up! Ready? “My Uber arrived late...” ok Pomp it!
